### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE distributions ( 
    distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    distribution_date DATE, 
    food_supply VARCHAR(255), 
    medical_supply VARCHAR(255), 
    beneficiary_id INT, 
    location VARCHAR(255) 
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE distributions SET food_supply = 'Rice', medical_supply = 'Bandages' WHERE distribution_id = 1;

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE distribution_centers (
  center_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  center_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  location TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
  supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  location TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE shipments (
  shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
  center_id INT NOT NULL,
  delivery_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (center_id) REFERENCES distribution_centers(center_id)
)

CREATE TABLE supplies (
  supply_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supply_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE distributions (
  distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supply_id INT NOT NULL,
  shipment_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity_received INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (supply_id) REFERENCES supplies(supply_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (shipment_id) REFERENCES shipments(shipment_id)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE distribution_centers SET center_name = 'New Center Name' WHERE center_id = 1;
